Room.Name: Castle Kayleigh Tower
Room.ShortDescription: You are the back of a copper dragon, sitting on the Tower of Kayleigh.
Room.LongDescription: The stone is blackened from a long ago fire, and all the doors have turned to ashes. Every portal seems to be open. As you look over the side, you can see a seething, bubbling moat. It appears to be filled with acid.
